title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A 
- Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 2) (Amendment) (No. 10) 
Regulations 2021. 

(2) Subject to paragraph (3), these Regulations shall come into operation 

on the 2nd day of August 2021. 

(3) Regulation 2(b) shall come into operation on the 5th day of August
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (no 2) (amendment) (no 10) regulation 2021 (2) subject paragraph (3) regulation shall come operation 2nd day august 2021 (3) regulation 2(b) shall come operation 5th day august

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-

19) (No.2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) are amended - 

(a) 

(b) 

in paragraph (2) of Regulation 1, by the substitution of “1st day 
of September 2021” for “2nd day of August 2021”, 

in Regulation 9, by the substitution of the following paragraph 
for paragraph (2): 

“(2) A person may organise, or cause to be 
organised, a wedding in a relevant geographical 
location in a premises or premises, as the case may be, 
other than a dwelling where the person takes all 
reasonable steps to ensure that the number of persons 
attending, or proposed to attend, the wedding does not 
exceed 100.”, and 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd August, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 (c) 

by the substitution of the Schedule to these Regulations for 
Schedule 3 to those Regulations. 

[410] 3 

 
 
 
 4 [410] 

Regulation 3A

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) 
to extend the period of operation of the Regulations until 01 September 2021. 
They also provide for an increase in the permitted number of attendees at 
wedding services and receptions to 100 from 05 August 2021, and make 
amendments to the list of “Scheduled Events” currently provided for under the 
Regulations, including a number of additional events. 

 
 
 
 
 
 12 [410]
